0: Hello everyone! My name is Denis and I am glad to welcome you to my Deep House Mix channel. On my channel I create compilations of popular music. You can listen to different genres: from classic Deep House, Nu Disco ... to Oriental motives and Chillout. You can also listen to not popular electronic music performers, as well as remixes of popular hits of all time. Please do not judge me strongly for my taste, please like and write a comment. I will be pleased! Thank you all for your attention and good mood!
